title: The Little world of Dietmar Fill
creator_credit: Film Australia, Don Murray, John Shaw and Greg Reading
brief_description: The late Dietmar Fill has been accorded many honours for his remarkable natural science films and his micro-photography. This series draws together the best of his work, giving us an insight into his film-making techniques and letting us meet the man.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Don Murray, John Shaw and Greg Reading
